definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Securely held by a lobster clasp closure, the pendant also comes with an extender chain.
sentences.chinese: 龙虾搭扣平安保险方便，并配有加长配饰。

sentences.english: Form pyriform to oblong or elongated .
Mail was starting to back up, and response times on the clients were starting to elongate.
sentences.chinese: 邮件开始备份，客户机上的响应时间开始加长。

sentences.english: Please allocate a long bed for me.
The structure of four-pillar oriented extended orientation cover is strong and survivable.
sentences.chinese: 四柱导向，加长型导向套，结构坚固耐。

sentences.english: You could use a tripod and a long exposure time.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用三角架，并加长曝光时间。

sentences.english: Double joint added to the front drive shaft and the shaft made longer.
sentences.chinese: 改装内容包括双十字轴和加长前传动轴。

sentences.english: CPVC housed stem extensions are not intended for the horizon ball valve series.
sentences.chinese: CPVC封装的阀杆加长件并不用于水平球阀系列。

sentences.english: As your hours increase, you will find there is less time to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 工作时间的加长，你会发现自己的睡眠时间少的可怜。

sentences.english: And they were good longer- some of them were even better longer.
sentences.chinese: 加长版的其实也不错，有些甚至好过实际播出的片子。

sentences.english: Of course we must put another board in the table, but after all is said and done it is better to be lengthening the table than shortening it down.
sentences.chinese: 当然我们得在桌上再加一套餐具，桌子也最好加长点。

sentences.english: The dragon edition will be available in both the regular Phantom model and the extended wheelbase Phantom model.
sentences.chinese: 常规的幻影车型及幻影加长车型都会推出龙年限量版。

sentences.english: Audi A6 to introduce domestic product of two generations of products are longer 100mm.
sentences.chinese: 奥迪A6引入国内生产两代产品加长100毫米。

sentences.english: The movie star was whisked away in the limousine .
sentences.chinese: 一辆加长型轿车匆匆把这位电影明星带走。

sentences.english: It creates as a distance between two points, rather than a straight line, an arabesque.
sentences.chinese: 它加长了两点之间的距离，使它变得非直而曲。

definition: to transition to a new dynasty or regime/to replace an older product with an upgraded, new-generation one
to lengthen/to pull sth out longer
